TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MsmqIntegrationMessageProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示訊息的訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 整合屬性。

span.span: Represents the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration properties for a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會公開 (Expose) 所有的訊息佇列訊息屬性，而您可以在傳送訊息或讀取使用整合通道所收到的訊息時設定這些屬性。The class exposes all of the Message Queuing message properties that you can set when you send a message or read a message that has been received using the integration channel. 類別也允許您設定訊息佇列訊息屬性，而這也是建議的訊息佇列訊息屬性設定方式。The class also enables you to set Message Queuing message properties, and is the recommended way to set Message Queuing message properties. 當您使用通道和訊息基礎結構來建立訊息，並透過整合通道傳送該訊息時，您可以使用 類別當做訊息的屬性，這樣整合通道就可以擷取這個訊息屬性並將訊息格式化為訊息佇列訊息，然後在網路上進行傳送。When you use the channels and messages infrastructure to create a message and send it over an integration channel, you can use the class as a property of the message so that the integration channel can retrieve the message properties and format the message as a Message Queuing message and send it on the wire.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AcknowledgeType As Nullable(Of AcknowledgeTypes)
public: property Nullable<System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes> AcknowledgeType { Nullable<System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要傳回到傳送應用程式的認可類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the acknowledgment type to return to the sending application.

value.span: 要傳回到傳送應用程式的認可類型。

span.span: The acknowledgment type to return to the sending application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Acknowledgment As Nullable(Of Acknowledgment)

summary.span: 取得訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 產生的認可訊息。

span.span: Gets the acknowledgment message that Message Queuing (MSMQ) generates.

value.span: 訊息佇列產生的認可訊息。

span.span: The acknowledgment message that Message Queuing generates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可設定的可能值是由 所定義。Possible values that this property can be set to are defined by . 當您接收來自管理佇列的訊息時，便可以使用這個值來驗證原始訊息的狀態。The value can be used to verify the status of the original message when you receive a message from an administration queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ AdministrationQueue { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定會接收訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 產生之認可訊息的佇列。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue that receives the acknowledgment messages that Message Queuing (MSMQ) generates.

value.span: 接收訊息佇列產生之認可訊息的佇列。

span.span: The queue that receives the acknowledgment messages that Message Queuing generates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳送至管理佇列的認可訊息可以指示原始訊息是否已抵達其目的端佇列，以及是否已從佇列中移除。The acknowledgment messages sent to the administration queue can indicate whether the original message reached its destination queue and whether it was removed from the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AppSpecific As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> AppSpecific { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };

summary.span: 指定額外的應用程式特定資訊。

span.span: Specifies additional application-specific information.

value.span: 值，表示額外的應用程式特定資訊。

span.span: An value that represents additional application-specific information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其中包含應用程式的特定資訊，可以讓您用來組織不同的訊息類型。Contains application-specific information that you can use to organize different types of messages. 例如，您可以使用應用程式特有的索引。For example, you can use application-specific indexes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ArrivedTime As Nullable(Of DateTime)
public: property Nullable<DateTime> ArrivedTime { Nullable<DateTime> get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息抵達目的端佇列的時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the time that the message arrived in the destination queue.

value.span: 訊息抵達目的端佇列的時間。

span.span: The time that the message arrived in the destination queue.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Authenticated As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Authenticated { Nullable<bool> get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定指出訊息是否已驗證的值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the message was authenticated.

value.span: 如果訊息已驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the message was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得指出訊息是否已驗證的值。Gets a value that indicates whether the message was authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Body { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the message.

value.span: MSMQ 訊息本文的內容。

span.span: The content of the MSMQ message body.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property BodyType As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> BodyType { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息本文包含的資料類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of data that the message body contains.

value.span: 訊息本文包含的資料類型。

span.span: The type of data that the message body contains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 會將本文內容辨識為物件或已序列化的資料流。Message Queuing (MSMQ) recognizes the body contents as an object or as a serialized stream. 本文類型會指出訊息本文內的物件型別。The body type indicates the type of the object within the body of the message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CorrelationId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定認可、報告和回應訊息用來參考原始訊息的訊息識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the message identifier used by acknowledgment, report, and response messages to reference the original message.

value.span: 認可、報告和回應訊息用來參考原始訊息的訊息識別項。

span.span: The message identifier used by acknowledgment, report, and response messages to reference the original message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 產生認可或報告訊息時，會使用相互關聯識別項來指定原始訊息的訊息識別項。When Message Queuing (MSMQ) generates an acknowledgment or report message, it uses the correlation identifier to specify the message identifier of the original message. 因此，相互關係識別項會將報告或認可訊息連結到原始訊息。In this manner, the correlation identifier ties the report or acknowledgment message to the original message. 這樣一來，傳送應用程式便可以使用相互關聯識別項，讓認可或報告訊息與原始訊息進行比對，以驗證原始訊息的身分識別。The sending application can then match the acknowledgment or report with the original message by using the correlation identifier to verify the original message's identity.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DestinationQueue As Uri
public: property Uri ^ DestinationQueue { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息要使用的目的端佇列。

span.span: Gets or sets the intended destination queue for the message.

value.span: 訊息要使用的目的端佇列。

span.span: The intended destination queue for the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常用來判定已放入日誌或寄不出信件佇列中之訊息的原始目的端。Most commonly used to determine the original destination of a message that arrived in a journal or dead-letter queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Extension { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與訊息關聯的其他應用程式定義資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets additional, application-defined information associated with the message.

value.span: 位元組陣列，其中包含與訊息關聯的其他應用程式定義資訊。

span.span: A byte array that contains additional, application-defined information associated with the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供與訊息關聯的應用程式定義資訊，例如大型二進位物件。Provides for application-defined information, such as a large binary object, that is associated with the message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationMessageProperty Get(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 要擷取其中訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 整合訊息屬性的訊息。

span.span: The message for which the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration message properties are to be retrieved.

summary.span: 取得指定訊息的 。

span.span: Gets the for a given message.

returns.span: 物件，其中包含指定之訊息的訊息佇列整合屬性。

span.span: A object that contains the Message Queuing integration properties for the specified message.

exception.span: 訊息上的屬性集合為 null。

span.span: The property collection on the message is null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Id As String
public: property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得訊息的識別項。

span.span: Gets the message's identifier.

value.span: 訊息的識別項。

span.span: The message's identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 會在傳送訊息時產生訊息識別項。Message Queuing (MSMQ) generates a message identifier when the message is sent. 識別項是由 20 個位元組所組成，並且包含兩個項目：傳送電腦的電腦 GUID 和電腦上唯一的訊息識別項。The identifier is composed of 20 bytes and includes two items: the machine GUID of the sending computer and a unique identifier for the message on the computer. 這兩個項目合併起來產生網路上唯一的訊息識別項。The combination of the two items produces a message identifier that is unique on the network. 訊息佇列會產生所有訊息的訊息識別項，包括認可和報告訊息。Message Queuing generates message identifiers for all messages, including acknowledgment and report messages. 認可訊息通常是由訊息佇列在傳送的原始訊息抵達或失敗時傳送。An acknowledgment message is generally sent by Message Queuing in response to the arrival or failure of an original sent message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Label { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式定義的 Unicode 字串，這個字串會描述訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets an application-defined Unicode string that describes the message.

value.span: 應用程式定義的 Unicode 字串，這個字串會描述訊息。

span.span: An application-defined Unicode string that describes the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息標籤可以用於多種用途。You can use a message label for several purposes. 例如，您可以將它用於顯示，或者根據標籤值對訊息進行選擇性的處理。For example, you can use it for display purposes or to selectively process messages based on the label value. 標籤在訊息間不需要是唯一的。It is not necessary to make the label unique across messages. 訊息佇列和訊息標籤表示應用程式定義的值，這個值會以人們可讀取 (Human-Readable) 的詞彙協助識別佇列或訊息。Message queue and message labels represent an application-defined value that can help identify the queue or message in human-readable terms. 應用程式必須負責解譯標籤內容，而這些內容對訊息佇列而言並不具有實質意義。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret the label contents, which have no intrinsic meaning to Message Queuing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageType As Nullable(Of MessageType)
public: property Nullable<System::Messaging::MessageType> MessageType { Nullable<System::Messaging::MessageType> get(); };

summary.span: 取得訊息類型：、 或 。

span.span: Gets the message type: , , or .

value.span: 訊息類型：、 或 。

span.span: The message type: , , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 通常會在傳送訊息時設定這個屬性。Message Queuing (MSMQ) typically sets this property when it sends the message. 訊息佇列的訊息可以是下列其中一個類型：A Message Queuing message can be one of the following types: - Normal：這是從應用程式傳送至佇列的一般訊息，或傳回給傳送應用程式的回應訊息。Normal, which is either a typical message sent from an application to a queue, or a response message returned to the sending application. - Acknowledgment：這是每當傳送應用程式要求時，訊息佇列就會產生的訊息。Acknowledgment, which Message Queuing generates whenever the sending application requests one. 例如，訊息佇列可以產生正或負訊息，以表示原始訊息已抵達或已被讀取。For example, Message Queuing can generate positive or negative messages to indicate that the original message arrived or was read. 訊息佇列會將適當的認可訊息傳回給傳送應用程式所指定的管理佇列。Message Queuing returns the appropriate acknowledgment message to the administration queue specified by the sending application. - Report：這是在每當來源佇列管理員有定義報告佇列時就會產生的訊息。Report, which is generated whenever a report queue is defined at the source Queue Manager. 追蹤功能啟用時，只要原始訊息進入或離開訊息佇列伺服器，訊息佇列就會傳送報告訊息至訊息佇列報告佇列。When tracing is enabled, Message Queuing sends a report message to the Message Queuing report queue each time the original message enters or leaves a Message Queuing server.

summary.span: 常數值 "MsmqIntegrationMessageProperty"。

span.span: The constant value "MsmqIntegrationMessageProperty".

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Priority As Nullable(Of MessagePriority)
public: property Nullable<System::Messaging::MessagePriority> Priority { Nullable<System::Messaging::MessagePriority> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Messaging::MessagePriority> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的優先權，用來決定訊息放置在佇列中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the message priority, which determines where in the queue the message is placed.

value.span: 訊息優先權。

span.span: The message priority.

value.span: 這個值是由 定義。

span.span: The values are defined by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 優先權會影響訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 對在路由中和抵達目的端時的訊息的處理方式。Priority affects how Message Queuing (MSMQ) handles the message both while it is en route and once it reaches its destination. 較高優先權的訊息在路由期間會給予喜好設定，並且插入目的端佇列的前端。Higher-priority messages are given preference during routing and inserted toward the front of the destination queue. 優先權相同的訊息會根據抵達時間放置在佇列中。Messages with the same priority are placed in the queue according to their arrival time.

exception.span: 這個值不是 null，而且也不在 值的範圍內。

span.span: The value is not null and is not within the range of values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ ResponseQueue { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定接收應用程式產生的回應訊息的佇列。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue that receives application-generated response messages.

value.span: 接收應用程式產生的回應訊息之佇列的 URI。

span.span: The URI for the queue that receives application-generated response messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別接收應用程式所產生回應訊息的佇列，而該接收應用程式會將這些回應訊息傳回給傳送應用程式。Identifies the queue that receives application-generated response messages, which the receiving application returns to the sending application. 傳送應用程式會在應用程式傳送其訊息時指定回應佇列。The sending application specifies response queues when the application sends its messages. 任何可用的佇列都可以指定為回應佇列。Any available queue can be specified as a response queue. 傳回至回應佇列的訊息是應用程式指定的。Messages returned to the response queue are application-specific. 應用程式必須定義訊息的內容以及接收訊息時要採取的動作。The application must define the contents of the messages as well as the action to take upon receipt of a message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SenderId As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ SenderId { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得傳送使用者的識別項。

span.span: Gets the identifier of the sending user.

value.span: 傳送使用者的識別項。

span.span: The identifier of the sending user.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SentTime As Nullable(Of DateTime)
public: property Nullable<DateTime> SentTime { Nullable<DateTime> get(); };

summary.span: 取得來源佇列管理員傳送訊息時傳送電腦上的日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the date and time on the sending computer that the message was sent by the source queue manager.

value.span: 來源佇列管理員傳送訊息時傳送電腦上的日期和時間。

span.span: The date and time on the sending computer that the message was sent by the source queue manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳送時間會調整為訊息建立時所位處電腦的本地時間。The sent time is adjusted to the local time of the computer on which the message was created. 這個時區可以不同於來源和目的端佇列的時區。This time zone can be different from those of the source and destination queues.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property TimeToReachQueue As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> TimeToReachQueue { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息抵達佇列的最大時間量。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time for the message to reach the queue.

value.span: 訊息抵達佇列的最大時間量。

span.span: The maximum amount of time for the message to reach the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 屬性指定的間隔在訊息抵達其目的端之前到期，MSMQ 就會依據繫結上 `DeadLetterQueue` 屬性指示的各種行為來捨棄訊息。If the interval specified by the property expires before the message reaches its destination, MSMQ discards the message depending on the behavior indicated by the `DeadLetterQueue` property on the binding.

exception.span: 這個值不是無限的，而且會大於 Int32.MaxValue 毫秒。

span.span: The value is not infinite and is greater than Int32.MaxValue milliseconds.
